oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Thomas Talley's Notebook
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Performing Identity
Musicians
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Presser's Music Writing Book inscribed "T.W. Talley 908 17th Avenue North, Nashville, Tenn.
The cover of this notebook lists 7 titles, presumably of song lyrics and/or tunes he had collected including "The Hammer that Killed John Henry."
